folders.name: TC0001 - Test Valid User Login
folders.description:
This test case covers the simple user login test case. 
- Login using a known user email and password 
- verify the identity of the returned user using /user/me

folders.name: TC0002 - Test Invalid Access Token
folders.description:
This test case verifies that sending an invalid 
access token does not return any user information.

folders.name: TC0003 - Test Invalid User Password
folders.description:
This test case verifies that sending an invalid user password 
does not log the user in.

folders.name: TC0004 - Test Invalid Client Secret
folders.description:
This test case verifies that using an invalid client secret 
to log a user in results in an error.

folders.name: TC0005 - Test Create New User
folders.description: Test the creation of a new user.

folders.name: TC0006 - Test Create New User Validations
folders.description: Test the creation of a new user API and the validation of input.

folders.name: TC0007 - Test List of Eligible Surveys
folders.description:
Test case to test that the right number of eligible surveys 
are returned for an user.

- Login in as known user.
- Remove all completed surveys thus far.
- Get list of eligible surveys. (user should be eligible for 
all surveys).

folders.name: TC0008 - Test Completion of Survey
folders.description:
Test case to test that the survey completion is correctly
recorded for an user.

- Login in as known user.
- Remove all completed surveys thus far.
- Get list of eligible surveys. (user should be eligible for 
all surveys).
- Complete one of the surveys
- Get list of eligible surveys (should be one less than what
was returned before)

folders.name: TC0009 - Test Upate User
folders.description:
This test case covers updating a user's details. Valid paratemeters to update:
    -Firstname
    -Lastname
    -Gender
    -Date of Birth

folders.name: TC0010 - Test Upate User Validations
folders.description: This test case covers User update validations.

folders.name: TC0012 - Test Log User Location Event
folders.description:
Test cases for logging a user location event. Must contain the following parameters:
    -location_id
    -latitude
    -longitude
    -event_type

folders.name: TC0013 - Test Log User Location Event - New Location
folders.description:
Test cases for logging a user location event. Must contain the following parameters:
    -location_id
    -latitude
    -longitude
    -event_type

folders.name: TC0014 - Test Log User Location Event Validations
TC0015 - Test Create New Bizrate-Facebook User
TC0016 - Test Create New Bizrate-Facebook User  Validations
TC0019 - Test Save User Device
folders.description: test the same user with 2 devices

folders.name: TC0020 - Test Save User Device - Validations
TC0021 - Test Save User Device - Transfer Device
folders.description:
Test cases for validating user's device.
Include test case with 2 users share 1 device

folders.name: TC0022 - Test Reset Password
folders.description:
This Test case tests the happy path of a reset password scenario.

- Reset password
- Verify the reset password email
- Find the link in the reset password email
- Follow the link to activate password
- Use the access token to login 
- Use the old password to be denied access
- Use the new password to confirm the password reset worked.

folders.name: TC0024 - Test Reset Password with Multiple Requests
folders.description:
This Test case tests the happy path of a reset password scenario.

- Reset password
- Verify the reset password email
- Find the link in the reset password email and save as link1
- Reset password again
- Verify the reset password email again
- Find the link in the reset password email and save as link2
- Follow the link to activate password in link1 and it should fail
- Follow the link to activate password in link2 and it should succeed
- Use the access token to login 
- Use the password used in first attempt to be denied access
- Use the password used in second attempt and it should work.
